Commander - Class in <Unnamed>
This class implements the behaviour expected from the WAM system as required for 5COM0087 Cwk 3 - Feb 2012

Constructor requires the name of the commander
Commander(String, String) - Constructor for class Commander
Constructor requires the name of the commander and the name of the file storing encounters
commissionUnit(String) - Method in class Commander
Allows a unit to be comissioned to the commander's army, if there is enough money in the War Chest for the commission fee.The unit's state is set to "active"
commissionUnit(String) - Method in interface WAM
Allows a unit to be comissioned to the commander's army, if there is enough money in the War Chest for the commission fee.The unit's state is set to "active"
